about.title: Mechatronics Engineer & Web Developer
bio: Mechatronics Engineer and Web Developer with proficiency in Ruby on Rails and NestJS development, using RSpec and Jest for testing, along with HTML, CSS, and ReactJS.
Experienced in working with Redis, RabbitMQ, and GitHub, and utilizing Scrum methodology with Jira and Trello.
Additionally, I have hands-on experience integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) into applications, including API consumption and AI-driven feature development.
I keep learning about this world of development and I want to work hand in hand with the best developers and people of all cultures to grow in many ways.
I am going to take any challenge!
about.checkOut: Check out my website, learn more about me
